text:
Message 989 of 4024
I'm frustrated and I want to communicate with you. We are getting a divorce because we did not do that. Can we not make our divorce shitty, and
our kid's lives hell for the same reason?
The spirit of my emails is accurate. I won't repeat them. I am frustrated to see us going in circles. But it is not helpful to make passive-aggressive and
cynical comments to make my point.
I want to apologize for my counterproductive tone. I'd like to try and resume working together as we discussed Tuesday. And if I am frustrated by
you, I want to respond better than I did tonight.
One thing I really wish we had done, and will do even now, is follow Dr Brown's instructions to see someone. A professional who can help us
communicate better.  Be kind. We did not, and here we are.
And tbh, I don't want to bother with Dr Brown if we are just going to blow off her advice again. It's just a waste of time and money. Especially if we
plan to still go to meditation in the future.
So I will try harder tomorrow. I hope you do too but it will not make me try less. I hope you can start to try and give a lirttle sometimes as well. But if
you do not, I will still try to do my best.
We should not be going from bad to worse. It's in our and the kid's best interest to both be happy. To appreciate each other, and our history. We
should advocate, not defame each other.
I hope we can break this cycle. This time this summer, you were laughing till you peed your pants. Swapping yummy sides. And heading home with
lust in our eyes and love in our heart. We gotta do better.
robert
Sent:02/02/2024 at 08:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Spirit v Tone
Message 990 of 4024

mind letting him know we will tip them in cash for that if it’s ok. Thanks!
